name: ngx-draft-js
author: Anton Strogonoff

scripts.build: yarn run build:inline && yarn run build:esm2015 && yarn run build:fesm2015 && yarn run build:esm5 && yarn run build:fesm5 && yarn run build:umd
scripts.dist:tsdef: cp -R tmp/esm2015/*.d.ts tmp/esm2015/*.json dist/ && cp -R tmp/esm2015/angular-draft-js/*.d.ts dist/angular-draft-js/ && cp -R tmp/esm2015/angular-draft-js/editors/*.d.ts dist/angular-draft-js/editors/
scripts.dist: yarn run dist:clean && yarn run build && yarn run dist:lib && yarn run dist:tsdef && yarn run build:clean && cp package-dist.json dist/package.json
scripts.clean: yarn run dist:clean && yarn run build:clean
scripts.semantic-release: cp .releaserc.yml dist/.releaserc.yml && cp package-dist.json dist/package.json && cd dist && semantic-release
